name: BlackBox: Man Down (Shooting Gallery)
description:
Single player shooting gallery. 60 sec of gun blazing, target shredding action. Destroy as many barrels as possible without hitting the "knockout" icons.

Upgrades:

Xbox/Ps controller compatible

Spinning Bonus Targets - Extra points

*STATS SCREEN - Keeps track of player score/high score 

*HIGH SCORE RESET - Added to reset OVERALL score.

NPC Chatter Box win screens

Full directional aiming - scope crosshairs added for better visibility

*2 player competition version available ONLY on full title.
